• Diagnosis may be delayed due to pregnancy masking the signs of cancer.
Diagnosis 
• Transvaginal and abdominal ultrasound have high sensitivity and specificity in the diagnosis of ovarian masses
even in pregnancy. However, MRI would be the best radiological modality.
Treatment of Ovarian Cancer in Pregnancy 
• Ovarian Cancer stages 1 and 2 can be treated surgically in the second and third trimesters with surgical stagin
